SEARCH
Package ch.joth.games.pocketsimon.game.code.codeimplementation

Class GameBehaviourService

java.lang.Object
ch.joth.games.pocketsimon.game.code.codeimplementation.GameBehaviourService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameBehaviour, ActionListener, MouseListener, EventListener
public class GameBehaviourService extends Object implements IGameBehaviour, ActionListener, MouseListener
This class represents the game behavior for the Pocket Simon game. It implements the IGameBehaviour interface and ActionListener and MouseListener for handling events.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBehaviourService

      public GameBehaviourService()
      Constructor for the GameBehaviour class. Initializes the renderer and sets the static gameBehaviour variable to this instance. Also initializes the timer and service for the game.
